pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Estimation of Heterogeneous Treatment Effects // Estimates heterogeneous treatment effects using tidy semantics on experimental or observational data. Methods are based on the doubly-robust learner of Kennedy (2023) doi:10.1214/23-EJS2157. You provide a simple recipe for what machine learning algorithms to use in estimating the nuisance functions and 'tidyhte' will take care of cross-validation, estimation, model selection, diagnostics and construction of relevant quantities of interest about the variability of treatment effects.
